DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study evaluate 1-year 3-year survival success MIS® C1 implant length 10-15mm . Specific Aims 1 . To study 1-year 3-year implant survival rate C1 implant 2 . To study 1-year 3-year implant bone level change C1 implant
DOC.brief_title: Survival Success MIS C1 Implants- Field Study
DOC.detailed_description: 10 implant allocate twelve dentist , total 120 implant . One test implant per patient allow study total 120 patient . The following data collect patient/implant : 1 . Patient data include birthdate , health , surgery date . 2 . Implant length , diameter 3 . Insertion torque 4 . Periapical radiograph ( insertion , twelve month post surgery ) . 5 . Post operative complication adverse event . 6 . Periodontal data around Ramfjord teeth ( 16 , 21 , 24 , 36 , 41 , 44 ) : Plaque index , Gingival Index , Probing depth six site Bleeding probe six site , baseline twelve month post surgery .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1875 . 2 . Patient express wish restore miss tooth/teeth implant therapy . 3 . Partial edentulism available bone height dental implant ≥ 10mm mm . 1 . Contraindicating medical condition uncontrolled diabetes , untreated malignancy , pregnancy , previous/current bisphosphonate therapy . 2 . Untreated periodontal disease , untreated caries , periapical pathology contact location perspective implant . 3 . Major bone augmentation conjunction implant placement . Localised bone augmentation conjunction implant placement , 3 mm 12 aspect implant allow . 4 . One stage immediate loading/restoration .
